message: Hello Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am interested in purchasing it but I can only afford to pay up to $100.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $110, but I'm not willing to go lower than that.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Could we meet at $105?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $105, but I'm willing to meet you at $115. That's the lowest I can go.
